analyzed: gal te dngos po 'di dag mgal me'i 'khor lo dang sprul pa la sogs pa ltar slu bas dngos po med par mi 'gyur na ni de'i tshe nges par 'thad pas rnam par dpyad pa nas le sbram la sogs pa ltar rang gi ngo bo ches gsal bar
translated: If things were not essenceless, like a magician‚Äôs illusion, a mirage, and so forth, then they would have to be established by valid cognition as existing by virtue of their own characteristic, just as a real thing is established by valid cognition.

original: dmigs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: dmigs par 'gyur na /
translated: If they were,

original: de dag ni phyin ci log tsam gyi rgyu can yin pas rnam par dpyod pa'i mes bsregs pas na rang gi ngo bos med par ni mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag ni phyin ci log tsam gyi rgyu can yin pas rnam par dpyod pa'i mes bsregs pas na rang gi ngo bos med par ni mi 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: since they are the causes of mere error, they would not fail to be nonexistent by virtue of their own natures, since they are burned up by the fire of analysis.

original: dngos po ni 'thad pa dang bral ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po ni 'thad pa dang bral ba ma yin te /
translated: Things are not devoid of justification,

original: de rnam pa thams @209b cad du mi slu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnam pa thams @209b cad du mi slu ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are nondeceptive in every way.

original: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis dngos po la mngon par zhen pa lhod par bya ba'i phyir 'di man chad du ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa rnams la rang gi ngo bo mi srid pa de ltar 'thad pa bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir slob dpon gyis dngos po la mngon par zhen pa lhod par bya ba'i phyir 'di man chad du ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa rnams la rang gi ngo bo mi srid pa de ltar 'thad pa bshad pa /
translated: For that very reason, the master [NƒÅgƒÅrjuna] explains the justification for how things are not possible in vases and so on, in order to loosen attachment to things.

original: gzugs nyid bum zhes gcig ma yin //
analyzed: gzugs nyid bum zhes gcig ma yin //
translated: Form itself is not the vase.

original: gzugs ldan bum gzhan yod min la //üîΩbum pa la gzugs yod min zhing //
analyzed: gzugs ldan bum gzhan yod min la // bum pa la gzugs yod min zhing //
translated: A vase possessing form does not exist as another.üîΩForm does not exist in the vase.

original: gzugs la bum pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: gzugs la bum pa yod ma yin //
translated: A vase does not exist in form.

original: 'di na bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po 'ga' zhig yod par 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: 'di na bum pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po 'ga' zhig yod par 'gyur na ni /
translated: If something called a ‚Äúvase‚Äù existed as a thing,

original: de lta ba'i dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba yin pas tha dad pa'am mi dad pa zhig tu rtog grang na /
analyzed: de lta ba'i dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba yin pas tha dad pa'am mi dad pa zhig tu rtog grang na /
translated: If it is thought that the eye sense faculty is either different or not different from the object that is apprehended,

original: de la re zhig /üîΩgzugs nyid bum zhes gcig ma yin //
analyzed: de la re zhig / gzugs nyid bum zhes gcig ma yin //
translated: then first of all:üîΩForm itself is not the pot.

original: gzugs gang yin pa de nyid bum pa'o zhes gzugs dang bum pa gcig pa ni mi srid do //
analyzed: gzugs gang yin pa de nyid bum pa'o zhes gzugs dang bum pa gcig pa ni mi srid do //
translated: It is impossible that form and the pot are the same, that the form itself is the pot.

original: gal te gzugs dang bum pa gnyis gcig nyid du 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te gzugs dang bum pa gnyis gcig nyid du 'gyur na ni /
translated: If the pot and the form were the same,

original: de'i tshe gang dang gang na gzugs yod pa de dang de na bum pa'o zhes gzugs thams cad la bum pa yod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de'i tshe gang dang gang na gzugs yod pa de dang de na bum pa'o zhes gzugs thams cad la bum pa yod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing /
translated: then wherever form exists, there the pot would exist, and the pot would exist in all forms.

original: so btang ba las skyes pa'i yon tan 'byung bas gzugs 'jig pa'i tshe bum pa 'jig par 'gyur na /
analyzed: so btang ba las skyes pa'i yon tan 'byung bas gzugs 'jig pa'i tshe bum pa 'jig par 'gyur na /
translated: And when the form is destroyed, the pot would be destroyed, because the pot arises from the form.

original: 'di ni srid pa yang ma yin pas gzugs nyid bum pa'o zhes gcig pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni srid pa yang ma yin pas gzugs nyid bum pa'o zhes gcig pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But this is not possible, so it is not the case that form itself is the pot.

original: ci ste nyes pa 'di spang bar 'dod nas dper na lha sbyin don gzhan du gyur pa'i ba lang dag dang ldan pa ltar gzugs las gzhan pa'i bum pa zhig gzugs dang ldan par yongs su rtog na /
analyzed: ci ste nyes pa 'di spang bar 'dod nas dper na lha sbyin don gzhan du gyur pa'i ba lang dag dang ldan pa ltar gzugs las gzhan pa'i bum pa zhig gzugs dang ldan par yongs su rtog na /
translated: But if you want to avoid this error, then just as Devadatta is conceived to possess cows which are different objects, you conceive a pot which is different from form to possess form.

original: 'di yang mi rigs te 'di ltar /
analyzed: 'di yang mi rigs te 'di ltar /
translated: This also is not tenable.

original: gzugs ldan bum gzhan yod min la //
analyzed: gzugs ldan bum gzhan yod min la //
translated: A pot different from form does not exist.

original: gal te bum pa gzugs las gzhan du 'gyur na ni de gzugs la mi ltos par gzung du yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te bum pa gzugs las gzhan du 'gyur na ni de gzugs la mi ltos par gzung du yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If a pot were different from form, it would be apprehended without depending on form.

original: ba lang dag las tha dad pa'i lha sbyin ni ba lang las tha dad par mi 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ba lang dag las tha dad pa'i lha sbyin ni ba lang las tha dad par mi 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: But just as Devadatta is not apprehended as different from cows which are different from him,

original: de bzhin du bum pa yang gzugs la mi ltos par bzung du yod par 'gyur na 'dzin pa yang ma yin no//
analyzed: de bzhin du bum pa yang gzugs la mi ltos par bzung du yod par 'gyur na 'dzin pa yang ma yin no//
translated: so too a pot would be apprehended without depending on form, but it is not.

original: de'i phyir gzugs las tha dad pa'i bum pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs las tha dad pa'i bum pa med do //
translated: Therefore a pot that is different from form does not exist.

original: gang gi tshe med pa de'i tshe yod pa ma yin pa ji ltar de dang ldan pa nyid du 'dzin //
analyzed: gang gi tshe med pa de'i tshe yod pa ma yin pa ji ltar de dang ldan pa nyid du 'dzin //
translated: When it does not exist, how can you apprehend it as possessing that which does not exist?

original: mo gsham gyi bu yod pa ma yin pa ni ba lang dang ldan no zhes bya bar mi bsnyad de /
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu yod pa ma yin pa ni ba lang dang ldan no zhes bya bar mi bsnyad de /
translated: It is not said that the son of a barren woman exists and is endowed with a cow.

original: de bzhin du bum pa gzugs dang ldan no zhes bya bar mi rung @210a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du bum pa gzugs dang ldan no zhes bya bar mi rung @210a * //
translated: In the same way, it is not suitable to say that a pot is endowed with form.

original: do ; / gzhan nyid mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs dang bum pa gnyis rten dang brten pa'i rtog pa nyid kyis grub pa yang med pas /üîΩbum pa la gzugs yod min zhing //
analyzed: do ; / gzhan nyid mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs dang bum pa gnyis rten dang brten pa'i rtog pa nyid kyis grub pa yang med pas / bum pa la gzugs yod min zhing //
translated: Since difference is impossible, the idea that form and pot are the support and the supported is also not established.üîΩA pot does not exist in form,

original: gzugs la bum pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: gzugs la bum pa yod ma yin //
translated: and form does not exist in a pot.

original: gzugs dang bum pa gnyis gzhan nyid yin na ni 'khar gzhong ltar bum pa la gzugs zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gzugs dang bum pa gnyis gzhan nyid yin na ni 'khar gzhong ltar bum pa la gzugs zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: If form and pot were different, then just as a pot is called a pot, form would also be called a pot.

original: re lde la lha sbyin ltar gzugs la bum pa zhes bya bar yang 'gyur na /
analyzed: re lde la lha sbyin ltar gzugs la bum pa zhes bya bar yang 'gyur na /
translated: And just as a pot is called a pot, form would also be called a pot, just as Devadatta is called a fence.

original: 'di ni srid pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni srid pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But this is not possible.

original: de'i phyir bum pa rang bzhin gyis med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bum pa rang bzhin gyis med do //
translated: Therefore a pot does not exist essentially.

original: gang zhig rang bzhin gyis med la dmigs pa yang yin pa de ni mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig rang bzhin gyis med la dmigs pa yang yin pa de ni mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin no //
translated: That which is not intrinsically real and yet is observed is empty of intrinsic reality, like the circle of a whirling firebrand.

original: gzhan yang ji ltar bdag byed pa po dang nye bar len pa las gcig nyid du thal ba'i phyir dang / phung po bzhin skye ba dang 'jig pa la brten pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir phung po bdag ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang bum pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji ltar bdag byed pa po dang nye bar len pa las gcig nyid du thal ba'i phyir dang / phung po bzhin skye ba dang 'jig pa la brten pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir phung po bdag ma yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang bum pa ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, just as the self is not the aggregates because of the absurdity of the self‚Äôs being the agent and the appropriated, and because of the absurdity of the self‚Äôs being dependent on arising and destruction like the aggregates, in the same way, form is not a pot,

original: nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po dag gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / nye bar len pa mang bas bum pa mang po nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar len pa dang nye bar len pa po dag gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / nye bar len pa mang bas bum pa mang po nyid du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the absurdity of the appropriator and the appropriated being the same, and because of the absurdity of the pot‚Äôs being multiple because of the multiplicity of the appropriated.

original: ji ltar so sor 'dzin par thal ba'i phyir dang / rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bdag phung po dag la gzhan du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du bum pa yang gzugs las tha dad par mi 'gyur te /üîΩso sor 'dzin par thal ba'i phyir dang / rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //üîΩyang ji ltar phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rtog pa med pas bdag phung po dang ldan no zhes bya bar bsnyad pa ma yin pa de bzhin du bum pa gzugs dang ldan no zhes bya bar yang mi srid do //
analyzed: ji ltar so sor 'dzin par thal ba'i phyir dang / rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir bdag phung po dag la gzhan du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du bum pa yang gzugs las tha dad par mi 'gyur te / so sor 'dzin par thal ba'i phyir dang / rgyu med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // yang ji ltar phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rtog pa med pas bdag phung po dang ldan no zhes bya bar bsnyad pa ma yin pa de bzhin du bum pa gzugs dang ldan no zhes bya bar yang mi srid do //
translated: Just as the self is not different from the aggregates because it follows that it would be apprehended separately and because it follows that it would be without a cause, so a pot is not different from form because it follows that it would be apprehended separately and because it follows that it would be without a cause.

original: gzugs dang bum pa dag de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs dang bum pa dag de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Just as the self is not described as possessing the aggregates because it is not conceived as the same as or different from the aggregates, so it is not possible to say that a pot possesses form because a pot is not conceived as the same as or different from form.

original: ji ltar phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rtog pa med pas bdag la phung po dag dang phung po dag la bdag go zhes bya ba rnam pa gnyi ga yang mi rigs pa de bzhin du bum pa la gzugs dang / gzugs la bum pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa gnyis kyang mi 'thad do //üîΩyang ji ltar gzugs la ltos nas bum pa la rtog @210b pa gzhi mi srid pa de bzhin du brtags pa'i rgyu thams cad la ltos pa'i gzhi yang mi srid pas bum pa rang gi ngo bos grub pa med do //
analyzed: ji ltar phung po dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rtog pa med pas bdag la phung po dag dang phung po dag la bdag go zhes bya ba rnam pa gnyi ga yang mi rigs pa de bzhin du bum pa la gzugs dang / gzugs la bum pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa gnyis kyang mi 'thad do // yang ji ltar gzugs la ltos nas bum pa la rtog @210b pa gzhi mi srid pa de bzhin du brtags pa'i rgyu thams cad la ltos pa'i gzhi yang mi srid pas bum pa rang gi ngo bos grub pa med do //
translated: Just as it is not tenable to say that the self is the aggregates or that the aggregates are the self because it is not conceived that the self is identical to or different from the aggregates, so it is not tenable to conceive that a vase is form or that form is a vase.üîΩMoreover, just as it is impossible to conceive a vase in reliance on form, it is impossible for a basis to exist in reliance on all causes of imputation. Therefore a vase does not exist inherently.

original: ji ltar bum pa rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du dngos po thams cad kyang btsal ba na rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pas srid pa mgal me'i 'khor lo dang sprul pa la sogs pa dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar bum pa rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du dngos po thams cad kyang btsal ba na rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma yin pas srid pa mgal me'i 'khor lo dang sprul pa la sogs pa dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as a vase does not exist essentially, so all things, when sought, do not exist essentially. Therefore existence is like a fire-brand wheel or an emanation.

original: 'dir kha cig dag na re gzugs dang bum pa dag la gzhan nyid mi srid mod kyi /
analyzed: 'dir kha cig dag na re gzugs dang bum pa dag la gzhan nyid mi srid mod kyi /
translated: Here, some say: It is indeed impossible for form and pot to be different.

original: de lta na yang dngos po dang bum pa gnyis pa gzhan nyid yod do //
analyzed: de lta na yang dngos po dang bum pa gnyis pa gzhan nyid yod do //
translated: However, there is difference between entity and pot.

original: gang gi phyir kho bo cag gi ltar na ni bum pa yang gzhan nyid yin la yod pa yang gzhan nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir kho bo cag gi ltar na ni bum pa yang gzhan nyid yin la yod pa yang gzhan nyid yin no //
translated: Because for us, a pot is different and an entity is different.

original: yod pa zhes bya ba ni spyi chen po yin la bum pa ni khyad par gyi rdzas yin te /
analyzed: yod pa zhes bya ba ni spyi chen po yin la bum pa ni khyad par gyi rdzas yin te /
translated: What is called entity is a universal, and a pot is a substance that is a particular.

original: de ni yod pa dang 'brel pa las yod do zhes bya bar bsnyad do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de ni yod pa dang 'brel pa las yod do zhes bya bar bsnyad do zhes zer ro //
translated: It is said that it exists because it is related to existence.

original: de dag la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag la brjod par bya ste /
translated: To them it should be said:

original: gnyis mtshan mi mthun mthong nas ni //
analyzed: gnyis mtshan mi mthun mthong nas ni //
translated: Having seen that the characteristics of the two are incompatible,

original: gal te dngos las bum gzhan na //
analyzed: gal te dngos las bum gzhan na //
translated: if a pot is different from an entity,

original: ma yin de ltar dngos po yang //
analyzed: ma yin de ltar dngos po yang //
translated: then in the same way,

original: bum pa las gzhan cis mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bum pa las gzhan cis mi 'gyur //
translated: why wouldn‚Äôt an entity be different from a pot?

original: gal te bum pa la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir dngos po ni spyi yin la /
analyzed: gal te bum pa la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir dngos po ni spyi yin la /
translated: Because it is characterized by being related to substances such as pots, an entity is a universal.

original: bum pa ni ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir khyad par gyi mtshan nyid do zhes dngos po dang bum pa de gnyis kyi mtshan nyid mi mthun pa mthong nas dngos po las bum pa gzhan du 'gyur na ni de kho na ltar mtshan nyid mi mthun
analyzed: bum pa ni ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir khyad par gyi mtshan nyid do zhes dngos po dang bum pa de gnyis kyi mtshan nyid mi mthun pa mthong nas dngos po las bum pa gzhan du 'gyur na ni de kho na ltar mtshan nyid mi mthun
translated: Because a vase has the characteristic of a reversal, it is a specific characteristic.

original: pa las dngos po yang bum pa las gzhan du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur /
analyzed: pa las dngos po yang bum pa las gzhan du ci'i phyir mi 'gyur /
translated: If a vase were different from a thing because these two things, a thing and a vase, are seen to have different characteristics, then just as they have different characteristics, why would a thing not be different from a vase?

original: de'i phyir mtshan nyid mi mthun pa kho na las gzhan gyi blo dang sgra 'jug pa grub pas gzhan gyi blo dang sgra'i rgyu mtshan rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can gzhan nyid gzhan pa rtag par mi bya ba zhig na /
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan nyid mi mthun pa kho na las gzhan gyi blo dang sgra 'jug pa grub pas gzhan gyi blo dang sgra'i rgyu mtshan rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can gzhan nyid gzhan pa rtag par mi bya ba zhig na /
translated: Therefore, since it is established that the mind and term of another are engaged due to just having different characteristics, if the difference that is the cause of the mind and term of another is not taken to be a characteristic that engages in a subsequent object,

original: gzhan nyid gzhan rtog pa yang yin pas 'o na dngos po dang bum pa dag la mtshan nyid mi mthun pa la ltos pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan nyid gzhan rtog pa yang yin pas 'o na dngos po dang bum pa dag la mtshan nyid mi mthun pa la ltos pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: then since the conception of the difference of another is also a conception of difference, a thing and a vase would not have a characteristic that depends on different characteristics.

original: de'i phyir / gnyis mtshan mi mthun mthong na ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gnyis mtshan mi mthun mthong na ni //
translated: Therefore: If one sees two different characteristics,

original: dngos las bum gzhan zhes bya ba de ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos las bum gzhan zhes bya ba de ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the so-called ‚Äúother‚Äù is different from the thing.

original: ji ltar dngos po rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir bum pa las gzhan yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir bum pa las gzhan yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the thing is different from the pot because it has the characteristic of being a subsequent state,

original: gzhan nyid @211a * //
analyzed: gzhan nyid @211a * //
translated: so too,

original: kyang rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir bum pa las gzhan du 'gyur la /
analyzed: kyang rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir bum pa las gzhan du 'gyur la /
translated: difference would be different from the pot because it has the characteristic of being a subsequent state.

original: gzhan nyid de la gzhan gyi blo dang sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid gzhan yod par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan nyid de la gzhan gyi blo dang sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid gzhan yod par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And the difference that is the reason for the application of the cognition and term ‚Äúdifference‚Äù to that difference would not exist as another.

original: gal te 'gyur na ni gzhan nyid rnams la mthar thug pa med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te 'gyur na ni gzhan nyid rnams la mthar thug pa med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it did, the error would ensue that the differences would be infinite.üîΩBut if the cognition of difference with regard to difference were to occur even without difference, then just as it is with regard to difference, so it would also be with regard to nondifference.

original: ci ste gzhan nyid med pa kho nar gzhan nyid la gzhan nyid kyi blor 'gyur na ni de kho na ltar gzhan la yang srid par 'gyur bar gyis shig / de'i phyir cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i gzhan nyid yongs su brtags pas ci zhig bya /
analyzed: ci ste gzhan nyid med pa kho nar gzhan nyid la gzhan nyid kyi blor 'gyur na ni de kho na ltar gzhan la yang srid par 'gyur bar gyis shig / de'i phyir cung zad kyang mi byed pa'i gzhan nyid yongs su brtags pas ci zhig bya /
translated: Therefore, what is the use of postulating a difference that does not perform any function at all?

original: gzhan nyid med na yang 'ga' la yang gang las kyang gzhan nyid med do zhes bya bar grub po //
analyzed: gzhan nyid med na yang 'ga' la yang gang las kyang gzhan nyid med do zhes bya bar grub po //
translated: If difference does not exist, then it is established that nothing is different from anything.

original: gzhan yang 'di bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di bsam par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, this should be considered:

original: yod pa ci 'dra ba zhig gzhan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur /
analyzed: yod pa ci 'dra ba zhig gzhan nyid dang ldan par 'gyur /
translated: What kind of existent would be associated with difference?

original: ci gzhan du gyur pa zhig gam 'on te gzhan ma yin par gyur pa zhig yin grang gal te gzhan du gyur pa zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: ci gzhan du gyur pa zhig gam 'on te gzhan ma yin par gyur pa zhig yin grang gal te gzhan du gyur pa zhig yin na ni /
translated: Would it be something that has become different or would it be something that has not become different? If it has become different,

original: de'i tshe gzhan nyid dang ldan pa'i don med do //
analyzed: de'i tshe gzhan nyid dang ldan pa'i don med do //
translated: then at that time there is no point in associating it with difference.

original: 'on te gzhan ma yin par gyur ba yin na de lta na yang 'gal ba gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang ldan pas gzhan nyid dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te gzhan ma yin par gyur ba yin na de lta na yang 'gal ba gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang ldan pas gzhan nyid dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it has not become different, then it is not associated with difference, because it is not different from that with which it is not different.

original: gzhan nyid med pas na bum pa las dngos po gzhan yin no zhes bya ba mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gzhan nyid med pas na bum pa las dngos po gzhan yin no zhes bya ba mi rung ngo //
translated: Since difference does not exist, it is not tenable to say, ‚ÄúAn entity is different from a pot.‚Äù

original: 'jig rten na ni phyin ci log tshad mar byas te yod pa'i blo dang sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pas bum pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na dngos po zhes bya bar 'jog gi / gzugs las rnam pa bzhir dpyad pa na de la rang bzhin yod
analyzed: 'jig rten na ni phyin ci log tshad mar byas te yod pa'i blo dang sgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan yin pas bum pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na dngos po zhes bya bar 'jog gi / gzugs las rnam pa bzhir dpyad pa na de la rang bzhin yod
translated: In the world, the reason for the occurrence of the word and idea of existence is the misapprehension of the non-existent as existent. Therefore, the very essence of the pot is posited as the thing.

original: pa ma yin pas de kho na nyid rig pa la ltos nas bum pa mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 'grub bo //
analyzed: pa ma yin pas de kho na nyid rig pa la ltos nas bum pa mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 'grub bo //
translated: When the pot is analyzed in four ways, it is not found to have intrinsic nature. Therefore, in dependence on the knowledge of reality, it is established that the pot is empty of intrinsic nature, like the circle of a whirling firebrand.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say:

original: bum pa ni yod pa nyid de yon tan gyi rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa ni yod pa nyid de yon tan gyi rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The pot exists because it is the basis of qualities.

original: yod pa ma yin pa ni yon rten gyi rten du ma mthong na bum pa gcig bum pa gnyis zhes bum pa yon tan gyi rten du 'gyur ba yang yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa ni yon rten gyi rten du ma mthong na bum pa gcig bum pa gnyis zhes bum pa yon tan gyi rten du 'gyur ba yang yin no //
translated: That which does not exist is not seen to be the basis of qualities, but the pot is the basis of qualities, as in ‚Äúone pot, two pots.‚Äù

original: gcig nyid la sogs pa rnams ni yon tan gyi tshig gi don gyis bsdus la bum pa ni rdzas yin zhing /
analyzed: gcig nyid la sogs pa rnams ni yon tan gyi tshig gi don gyis bsdus la bum pa ni rdzas yin zhing /
translated: One, etc., are included in the meaning of the word quality, but the pot is a substance.

original: yon tan rnams rdzas la brten pa nyid kyang srid pa yin no //
analyzed: yon tan rnams rdzas la brten pa nyid kyang srid pa yin no //
translated: It is possible that the qualities are based on substance.

original: de'i phyir yon tan gyi rten yin pa'i phyir bum pa yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir yon tan gyi rten yin pa'i phyir bum pa yod pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, because the qualities are based on it, the pot exists.

original: 'di la brjod par @211b bya ste ;
analyzed: 'di la brjod par @211b bya ste ;
translated: This is to be said:

original: khyod kyi lugs kyis /
analyzed: khyod kyi lugs kyis /
translated: In your system,

original: gal te gcig bum mi 'dod na //
analyzed: gal te gcig bum mi 'dod na //
translated: if one is not accepted as a pot,

original: bum pa'ang gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bum pa'ang gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the pot also would not be one.

original: gal te tshig gi don tha dad pas gcig bum par mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: gal te tshig gi don tha dad pas gcig bum par mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
translated: If you think that because the meanings of the words are different, one is not a pot,

original: 'o na ni bum pa yang gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni bum pa yang gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the pot also would not be one.

original: ji ltar gcig nyid de gcig gi grangs bum par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rdzas nyid kyis gcig gi grangs las gzhan du 'gyur pa'i phyir bum pa yang gcig tu mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar gcig nyid de gcig gi grangs bum par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rdzas nyid kyis gcig gi grangs las gzhan du 'gyur pa'i phyir bum pa yang gcig tu mi 'gyur te /
translated: Just as one is not the number one of a pot because it is one, in the same way, because the pot is different from the number one of substance, the pot also would not be one,

original: gnyis nyid la sogs pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs so //
analyzed: gnyis nyid la sogs pa bzhin no snyam du dgongs so //
translated: just like the number two and so on.

original: gzhan yang bum pa 'di rang bzhin gcig la gcig gis rtog gam /üîΩrang bzhin du ma la yin grang //
analyzed: gzhan yang bum pa 'di rang bzhin gcig la gcig gis rtog gam /üîΩrang bzhin du ma la yin grang //
translated: Moreover, is this pot imagined to be one nature or many natures?

original: gal te rang bzhin gcig la yin na ni de'i tshe gcig rtog pa don med do //
analyzed: gal te rang bzhin gcig la yin na ni de'i tshe gcig rtog pa don med do //
translated: If it is one nature, then it is pointless to imagine it as one.

original: 'on te rang bzhin du ma la yin na ni de'i tshe yang 'gal ba'i phyir mi rigs pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on te rang bzhin du ma la yin na ni de'i tshe yang 'gal ba'i phyir mi rigs pa nyid do //
translated: But if it is many natures, then it is still unreasonable because of contradiction.

original: de'i phyir 'jig rten na don gzhan mi nye ba'i bum pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na la gcig tu rtog par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig rten na don gzhan mi nye ba'i bum pa'i rang gi ngo bo kho na la gcig tu rtog par shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand that in the world, the nature of a vase is imagined to be one, without the proximity of another object.

original: ci ste yon tan rnams rdzas la brten pas bum pa kho na gcig tu 'gyur gyi gcig nyid ni bum par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yon tan rnams rdzas la brten pas bum pa kho na gcig tu 'gyur gyi gcig nyid ni bum par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if the qualities are based on substance, then only the vase would be one, but oneness would not be the vase.

original: 'di la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di la brjod par bya ste /
translated: This should be addressed.

original: ldan 'di mtshungs pa'ang ma yin la //
analyzed: ldan 'di mtshungs pa'ang ma yin la //
translated: This possession is not the same,

original: des kyang gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des kyang gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and it does not become one by that.

original: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa dag kho na la 'gyur gyi mi mtshungs pa dag la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa dag kho na la 'gyur gyi mi mtshungs pa dag la ni ma yin te /
translated: What is called possession occurs only in the same, not in the different.

original: dper na ldan pa gnyis la gnas pas spun gnyi ga la yang spun zla nyid dang 'brel pa yin gyi gang yang rung ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ldan pa gnyis la gnas pas spun gnyi ga la yang spun zla nyid dang 'brel pa yin gyi gang yang rung ba ni ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, because of the two possessing, the two brothers are related to the state of being brothers, but not to any one of them.

original: gcig dang bum pa gnyis ni mtshungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig dang bum pa gnyis ni mtshungs pa ma yin te /
translated: One and a pot are not similar,

original: bum pa kho na gcig nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir la gcig nyid bum pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bum pa kho na gcig nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir la gcig nyid bum pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir te /
translated: because only a pot possesses oneness, but oneness does not possess a pot,

original: yon tan rnams ni rdzas la brten pa'o zhes khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yon tan rnams ni rdzas la brten pa'o zhes khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is accepted that qualities are based on substances.

original: de la gang gi phyir gcig ni yon tan du mthong la bum pa ni rdzas yin zhing rdzas dang yon tan gnyis kyang mtshungs par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir de gnyis ldan pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gang gi phyir gcig ni yon tan du mthong la bum pa ni rdzas yin zhing rdzas dang yon tan gnyis kyang mtshungs par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir de gnyis ldan pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since one is seen as a quality and a pot is a substance, and since the two, substance and quality, are not similar, therefore they do not possess each other.

original: ldan pa med pas kyang gang gcig dang ldan pa las bum pa kho na gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de yang ma yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa med pas kyang gang gcig dang ldan pa las bum pa kho na gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de yang ma yin no //
translated: And because they do not possess each other, it is not the case that only a pot is one because of possessing one.

original: gal te 'dir ldan pa mthong na ni de'i tshe bum pa yang gcig dang ldan par 'gyur la gcig kyang bum pa dang ldan par 'gyur na /üîΩde ni de ltar srid pa yang @212a * //
analyzed: gal te 'dir ldan pa mthong na ni de'i tshe bum pa yang gcig dang ldan par 'gyur la gcig kyang bum pa dang ldan par 'gyur na / de ni de ltar srid pa yang @212a * //
translated: If it were seen to be associated with this, then at that time the pot would be associated with one, and one would be associated with the pot.üîΩBut that is not possible.

original: ma yin pas de gnyis kyi ldan pa nyid mi 'thad do //
analyzed: ma yin pas de gnyis kyi ldan pa nyid mi 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, their association is untenable.

original: ldan pa med pas kyang gcig bum par mi 'gyur bas bum pa yang gcig ma yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa med pas kyang gcig bum par mi 'gyur bas bum pa yang gcig ma yin no //
translated: Since there is no association, the one is not the pot. Therefore, the pot is not one either.

original: de'i phyir 'dir phyed snga mas ni ldan pa khas blangs nas sun 'byin pa bshad la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir phyed snga mas ni ldan pa khas blangs nas sun 'byin pa bshad la /
translated: Thus, in the first half of this verse, Candrakƒ´rti explains the refutation by accepting association.

original: phyed phyi mas ni ldan pa mi srid pa'i sgo nas sun 'byin pa bshad do //
analyzed: phyed phyi mas ni ldan pa mi srid pa'i sgo nas sun 'byin pa bshad do //
translated: In the second half of the verse, he explains the refutation by showing the impossibility of association.

original: kyang gi sgra ni sun 'byin pa'i rgyu bsdu ba'i don du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni sun 'byin pa'i rgyu bsdu ba'i don du blta bar bya'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù should be seen as referring to the inclusion of the reason for the refutation.

original: gzhan yang pha rol po'i gzhung lugs la /
analyzed: gzhan yang pha rol po'i gzhung lugs la /
translated: Moreover, in the opponent‚Äôs system,

original: gang yon tan rnams rdzas la brten par rnam par 'jog cing khyad par gyi yon tan rnams yon tan la brten par ni ma yin pa ches mi rigs pa 'di snang na /
analyzed: gang yon tan rnams rdzas la brten par rnam par 'jog cing khyad par gyi yon tan rnams yon tan la brten par ni ma yin pa ches mi rigs pa 'di snang na /
translated: it is very unreasonable to posit that qualities depend on substance but that the specific qualities do not depend on substance.

original: yon tan rnams kyang yon tan la brten pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyang yon tan la brten pa nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: It is also unreasonable that qualities are based on qualities.

original: 'di na bum pa bod tshad ci tsam yin pa de tsam kho nar de'i rten can gyi gzugs kyang 'gyur dgos so //
analyzed: 'di na bum pa bod tshad ci tsam yin pa de tsam kho nar de'i rten can gyi gzugs kyang 'gyur dgos so //
translated: Here, the form that is the basis of a vase must be just as large as the vase itself.

original: de'i phyir rdzas ltar gzugs kyang chen po nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir rdzas ltar gzugs kyang chen po nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, like the substance, the form would also be large.

original: gang tshe bras ci tsam gzugs na //
analyzed: gang tshe bras ci tsam gzugs na //
translated: When the size of the substance,

original: de'i tshe gzugs chen ci ste min //
analyzed: de'i tshe gzugs chen ci ste min //
translated: why isn‚Äôt the form also large?

original: gang gi tshe rdzas ci tsam ste /üîΩrdzas kyi chu zhing gi bdag nyid can gyi dbyibs ji tsam yin pa de tsam gzugs te gzugs kyi chu zheng gi bdag nyid can gyi dbyibs yin no zhes gzhan gyis khas blangs pa de'i tshe nges par phra ba dang che ba'i rdzas de la gzugs kyang phra
analyzed: gang gi tshe rdzas ci tsam ste / rdzas kyi chu zhing gi bdag nyid can gyi dbyibs ji tsam yin pa de tsam gzugs te gzugs kyi chu zheng gi bdag nyid can gyi dbyibs yin no zhes gzhan gyis khas blangs pa de'i tshe nges par phra ba dang che ba'i rdzas de la gzugs kyang phra
translated: When the size of the substance,

original: ba dang che ba nyid du 'gyur dgos so //
analyzed: ba dang che ba nyid du 'gyur dgos so //
translated: the shape that is the nature of the substance, is just that size, the form is just that size, the shape that is the nature of the form is just that size. When others assert this, then definitely the form of that subtle or large substance would also be subtle or large.

original: de'i phyir gang rdzas bzhin du gzugs la phra ba dang chen po nyid dag mi 'dod pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang rdzas bzhin du gzugs la phra ba dang chen po nyid dag mi 'dod pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod //
translated: Therefore, what is the reason for not asserting that form is subtle or gross like a substance?

original: ci ste gzugs ni yon tan yin zhing phra ba nyid dang chen po nyid kyang yon tan kho na yin la /
analyzed: ci ste gzugs ni yon tan yin zhing phra ba nyid dang chen po nyid kyang yon tan kho na yin la /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúForm is a quality and subtlety and grossness are only qualities,

original: yon tan ni yon tan gyi dbyibs su yang mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kho bo cag gi lugs yin te de'i phyir rdzas ji tsam yin pa de tsam kho nar gzugs kyang yin mod kyi de ltar na yang grub pa'i mtha' dang
analyzed: yon tan ni yon tan gyi dbyibs su yang mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kho bo cag gi lugs yin te de'i phyir rdzas ji tsam yin pa de tsam kho nar gzugs kyang yin mod kyi de ltar na yang grub pa'i mtha' dang
translated: and qualities do not have the shape of qualities,‚Äù this is our system, and therefore form is just the size of a substance.

original: 'gal ba'i 'jigs pas gzugs la phra ba nyid dang chen po nyid dag yod pa ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i 'jigs pas gzugs la phra ba nyid dang chen po nyid dag yod pa ma yin no snyam na /
translated: But because of the fear of contradicting our philosophical tenet, we assert that subtlety and grossness do not exist in form.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We respond:

original: gal te phyir rgol gzhan min na //
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol gzhan min na //
translated: If you are not a challenger of others,

original: gzhung lugs bsnyad par bya bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhung lugs bsnyad par bya bar 'gyur //
translated: you should state your own textual system.

original: gal te phyir rgol khyod rang gi sde tshan nyid du 'gyur na ni de'i de la gnod par nus pas de bzlog par bya ba'i phyir de la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal @212b bar brjod par rigs na /
analyzed: gal te phyir rgol khyod rang gi sde tshan nyid du 'gyur na ni de'i de la gnod par nus pas de bzlog par bya ba'i phyir de la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal @212b bar brjod par rigs na /
translated: If you were an opponent of our own Buddhist schools, then it would be right to state a contradiction with our tenets in order to refute you, since you could be harmed by that.

original: gang gi tshe pha rol po phyir rgol ba yin na ni de la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba brjod pa ci yang mi byed pa zhig ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe pha rol po phyir rgol ba yin na ni de la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba brjod pa ci yang mi byed pa zhig ste /
translated: But when you are an opponent who is an outsider, then you should not state any contradiction with our tenets at all,

original: de'i grub pa'i mtha' de sel bar zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i grub pa'i mtha' de sel bar zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because you are engaged in refuting our tenets.

original: de la rigs pa dang 'jig rten dang 'gal ba brjod pa ni rigs te /
analyzed: de la rigs pa dang 'jig rten dang 'gal ba brjod pa ni rigs te /
translated: Stating a contradiction with reasoning and the world is correct,

original: de'i sgo nas de bzlog par nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas de bzlog par nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because you can be refuted by those means.

original: de'i phyir lung dang 'gal ba brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni lan ma yin pa nyid pas nyes pa de nyid ma g-yos pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir lung dang 'gal ba brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni lan ma yin pa nyid pas nyes pa de nyid ma g-yos pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since stating a contradiction with scripture is not a response at all, that fault remains unmoved.

original: de'i phyir dngos po dang bum pa gnyis la gzhan nyid med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dngos po dang bum pa gnyis la gzhan nyid med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference between things and pots.

original: de'i phyir 'dir yod pa gzhan nyid bkag pas de las gzhan bum pa nyid la sogs pa spyi dang bye brag rnams dgag pa yang shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir yod pa gzhan nyid bkag pas de las gzhan bum pa nyid la sogs pa spyi dang bye brag rnams dgag pa yang shes par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, here, by refuting the otherness of existence, one should understand that the refutation of universals and instances such as ‚Äúpot‚Äù and so on, which are other than that, is also established.

original: spyi'i yon tan rnams ni grangs dang 'dra la bye brag gi yon tan rnams ni chen po nyid dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: spyi'i yon tan rnams ni grangs dang 'dra la bye brag gi yon tan rnams ni chen po nyid dang 'dra'o //
translated: The qualities of the universal are similar to number, and the qualities of the instance are similar to magnitude.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say:

original: bum pa la sogs pa dag las dngos po gzhan nyid yin pa dgag pa ni bshad na /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa dag las dngos po gzhan nyid yin pa dgag pa ni bshad na /
translated: You have refuted the otherness of things such as pots from existence.

original: bum pa'i rang bzhin ni ma bkag pas dngos po bum pa zhes bya ba rang gi ngo bos yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bum pa'i rang bzhin ni ma bkag pas dngos po bum pa zhes bya ba rang gi ngo bos yod pa kho na'o //
translated: But since the nature of the pot is not refuted, the thing called ‚Äúpot‚Äù certainly exists by its own nature.

original: brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par bya ste /
translated: We reply:

original: mtshan nyid kyis kyang mtshan gzhi ni //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyis kyang mtshan gzhi ni //
translated: The basis of characteristics

original: gang du grub pa yod min pa //
analyzed: gang du grub pa yod min pa //
translated: is not established anywhere.

original: der ni grangs sogs tha dad par //
analyzed: der ni grangs sogs tha dad par //
translated: There, things such as number

original: dngos po yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa ma yin no //
translated: do not exist as different entities.

original: 'dir bum pa dang yod pa dag la ldog pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid smra ba na /
analyzed: 'dir bum pa dang yod pa dag la ldog pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid smra ba na /
translated: Here, when one speaks of the characteristics of the pot and existence as being mutually exclusive and inclusive,

original: pha rol pos bum pa la ldog pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: pha rol pos bum pa la ldog pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: The opponent posits the definition of the isolate of pot.

original: de'i phyir mtshan nyid 'dis kyang mtshan gzhi grub pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan nyid 'dis kyang mtshan gzhi grub pa med do //
translated: Therefore, the basis of those characteristics is not established by those characteristics.

original: gang zhig mtshan gzhi nyid du grub par 'gyur ba ldog pa tsam gyis dngos po rnams kyi dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo nges par mi nus so //
analyzed: gang zhig mtshan gzhi nyid du grub par 'gyur ba ldog pa tsam gyis dngos po rnams kyi dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo nges par mi nus so //
translated: That which is established as the basis of characteristics cannot be ascertained as the nature of an entity by mere isolation.

original: re zhig gcig ni yon tan yin pa'i phyir bum par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: re zhig gcig ni yon tan yin pa'i phyir bum par mi 'gyur la /
translated: First, since it is a quality, it would not be a pot.

original: phra ba dang chen po zhes bya ba dang / gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang yon tan yin pa'i phyir bum pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phra ba dang chen po zhes bya ba dang / gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang yon tan yin pa'i phyir bum pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, since subtle and coarse and so on are qualities, they would not be called pots.

original: yod pa yang rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams kyi spyi yin pa'i phyir bum par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod pa yang rdzas dang yon tan dang las rnams kyi spyi yin pa'i phyir bum par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Also, since existence is the universal of substances, qualities, and actions, it would not be a pot.

original: de'i phyir 'di grangs dang phra ba dang chen po dang gzugs la sogs pa rnams las ldog pa ni rang bzhin 'di 'dra ba zhig go zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag par mi nus @213a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di grangs dang phra ba dang chen po dang gzugs la sogs pa rnams las ldog pa ni rang bzhin 'di 'dra ba zhig go zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag par mi nus @213a * //
translated: Therefore, it is impossible to posit the negation of number, subtlety, largeness, form, and so on as having such and such an intrinsic reality.

original: so ; / de'i phyir de ltar rgol ba gzhan gyi phyogs gang du mtshan nyid kyis kyang mtshan gzhi'i bum pa'i rang gi ngo bos grub pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyogs der dngos po bum pa zhes bya ba'i grangs la sogs pa las tha dad par rang gi ngoüîΩbo yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: so ; / de'i phyir de ltar rgol ba gzhan gyi phyogs gang du mtshan nyid kyis kyang mtshan gzhi'i bum pa'i rang gi ngo bos grub pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyogs der dngos po bum pa zhes bya ba'i grangs la sogs pa las tha dad par rang gi ngo bo yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in any opponent‚Äôs position where the basis of the definition, the vase, does not exist by virtue of its own nature, in that position, the entity called ‚Äúvase‚Äù does not exist as a separate entity from number and so on.

original: de'i phyir bum pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar grub bo //
analyzed: de'i phyir bum pa rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar grub bo //
translated: Therefore it is established that the vase is empty of intrinsic reality.

original: rnam pa gcig tu na grangs dang gzugs la sogs pa dag ni bum pa'i mtshan nyid yin la bum pa ni de dag gis mtshon par bya ba yin pas mtshan gzhi yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu na grangs dang gzugs la sogs pa dag ni bum pa'i mtshan nyid yin la bum pa ni de dag gis mtshon par bya ba yin pas mtshan gzhi yin te /
translated: Alternatively, number, form, and so on are the definition of the vase, and the vase is the definiendum that is indicated by them.

original: de la ni mtshan nyid kyang rang gi ngo bo logs su grub pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ni mtshan nyid kyang rang gi ngo bo logs su grub pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But in that case, the definition does not exist as a separate entity,

original: grangs la sogs pa las tha dad par de'i rang gi ngo bo ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grangs la sogs pa las tha dad par de'i rang gi ngo bo ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its own nature is not observed as separate from number, etc.

original: gal te mtshan gzhi de rang gi ngo bos rnyed na ni de'i tshe nges par 'di ni bum pa'i rang gi ngo bos grangs la sogs pa las tha dad pa de yin la /
analyzed: gal te mtshan gzhi de rang gi ngo bos rnyed na ni de'i tshe nges par 'di ni bum pa'i rang gi ngo bos grangs la sogs pa las tha dad pa de yin la /
translated: If the definiendum were found by its own nature, then at that time, it would definitely be observed as separate from number, etc.

original: yang 'di ni de'i mtshan nyid grangs la sogs pa'o zhes grangs la sogs pa tha dad par gzung du yod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: yang 'di ni de'i mtshan nyid grangs la sogs pa'o zhes grangs la sogs pa tha dad par gzung du yod par 'gyur na /
translated: Moreover, it would be observed as separate from number, etc., that this is its definition.

original: 'di ni de ltar yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni de ltar yang ma yin no //
translated: But it is not like that.üîΩTherefore,

original: de'i phyir / mtshan nyid kyis kyang mtshan gzhi ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / mtshan nyid kyis kyang mtshan gzhi ni //
translated: The definiendum is not establishedüîΩAnywhere by the definition.

original: gang du grub pa yod min pa //
analyzed: gang du grub pa yod min pa //
translated: There is no entity

original: der ni grangs sogs tha dad par //üîΩdngos po yod pa ma yin no /
analyzed: der ni grangs sogs tha dad par // dngos po yod pa ma yin no /
translated: That is separate from number, etc.

original: de'i phyir bum pa rang gi ngo bos med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir bum pa rang gi ngo bos med do //
translated: Therefore, the pot does not exist by its own nature.

original: re zhig mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi dag gzhan nyid yin dang dgag pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: re zhig mtshan nyid dang mtshan gzhi dag gzhan nyid yin dang dgag pa bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that the characteristic and the basis characterized are not different.

original: gang zhig gi bum pa gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang gcig pa grub pa'i mtha' yin pa de dgag pa'i phyir 'di brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gang zhig gi bum pa gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang gcig pa grub pa'i mtha' yin pa de dgag pa'i phyir 'di brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, in order to refute the theory that the pot is identical with form, etc., this is said:

original: mtshan nyid rnams dang so so ni //üîΩmin phyir bum pa gcig ma yin //
analyzed: mtshan nyid rnams dang so so ni // min phyir bum pa gcig ma yin //
translated: Because the characteristics are notüîΩindividually the pot, the pot is not one.

original: re re bum pa med na ni //
analyzed: re re bum pa med na ni //
translated: If the pot does not exist in each,

original: mang nyid 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mang nyid 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: plurality is not tenable.

original: gang dag gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa yin zhing de rnams dang bum pa so so ma yin pa nyid du 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na /
analyzed: gang dag gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa yin zhing de rnams dang bum pa so so ma yin pa nyid du 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na /
translated: For those who believe that form, etc., are various characteristics and that the pot is not individual from them,

original: bum pa mtshan nyid gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang so so ma yin pa'i phyir gcig tu mi 'thad de mang po rnams dang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa mtshan nyid gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang so so ma yin pa'i phyir gcig tu mi 'thad de mang po rnams dang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: the pot is not tenable as one because it is not individual from the characteristics, form, etc., and because it is not different from the many.

original: de la gal te bum pa gcig tu mi 'gyur na 'o na mang po nyid du 'gyur ro snyam du @213b 'dod na 'di la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de la gal te bum pa gcig tu mi 'gyur na 'o na mang po nyid du 'gyur ro snyam du @213b 'dod na 'di la brjod par bya ste /
translated: But if you think that if the vase is not one, then it is many, then this should be said to you:

original: gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnams las re re la bum pa med pa mthong ba de'i phyir mang po nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnams las re re la bum pa med pa mthong ba de'i phyir mang po nyid kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Since the vase is not seen in each of form and so on, therefore many also do not exist.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Objection:

original: gal te gzugs la sogs pa mtshan nyid rnams dang so so ma yin pa'i phyir bum pa la gcig med na /
analyzed: gal te gzugs la sogs pa mtshan nyid rnams dang so so ma yin pa'i phyir bum pa la gcig med na /
translated: If the vase does not exist as one because it is not identical to its characteristics such as form,

original: de rnams phan tshun sbyor ba las bum pa gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams phan tshun sbyor ba las bum pa gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: then the vase would be one due to the combination of those.

original: 'di la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di la brjod par bya ste /
translated: This should be said to you:üîΩThere is no such thing as a combination

original: reg ldan reg dang mi ldan dang // lhan cig sbyor ba zhes bya med //üîΩde'i phyir gzugs sogs rnams sbyor ba //
analyzed: reg ldan reg dang mi ldan dang // lhan cig sbyor ba zhes bya med // de'i phyir gzugs sogs rnams sbyor ba //
translated: of that which is tangible and that which is not.üîΩTherefore it is illogical in every way

original: rnam pa kun tu'ang rigs ma yin //
analyzed: rnam pa kun tu'ang rigs ma yin //
translated: to combine form and so on.

original: de la reg pas na reg pa ste lus kyi dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de la reg pas na reg pa ste lus kyi dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: Here that which is tangible is that which is to be apprehended by the body faculty.

original: de 'di la yod pas na reg ldan no //
analyzed: de 'di la yod pas na reg ldan no //
translated: Since it exists in that, it is tangible.

original: lus kyi dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir reg bya kho na reg ldan yin te /üîΩreg bya reg pa dang ldan pa de gzugs dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang mi ldan pa rnams dang sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po'i gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir reg bya kho na reg ldan yin te / reg bya reg pa dang ldan pa de gzugs dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang mi ldan pa rnams dang sbyor ba ste /
translated: Only tangible objects are in contact, because they are the objects of the body faculty.

original: phrad cing reg pa mi srid de dper na nam mkha' dang bum pa bzhin no //
analyzed: phrad cing reg pa mi srid de dper na nam mkha' dang bum pa bzhin no //
translated: Tangible objects are in contact, but they are not in contact with form, smell, or taste, because it is impossible for them to come together and make contact, just as space and a pot are not in contact.

original: gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi sbyor ba rnam pa thams cad du mi srid do //üîΩgang gi tshe de ltar yin pa de'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par phan tshun phrad pas byas pa las tshogs pa'i rgyu can bum pa yin no zhes bya ba gang smras pa de mi rigs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di de ltar yin pa de'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi sbyor ba rnam pa thams cad du mi srid do // gang gi tshe de ltar yin pa de'i tshe gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi khyad par phan tshun phrad pas byas pa las tshogs pa'i rgyu can bum pa yin no zhes bya ba gang smras pa de mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is impossible for form and so on to be in contact in any way.üîΩSince this is the case, it is illogical to say that a pot is the effect of the collection of form and so on, because it is produced by the mutual contact of form and so on.

original: ci ste phan tshun reg pa med par yang de rnams kyi tshogs pa nyid du bum pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste phan tshun reg pa med par yang de rnams kyi tshogs pa nyid du bum pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you say that a pot is the effect of the collection of form and so on, even though they do not make mutual contact,

original: de yang yod pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: de yang yod pa ma yin te ;
translated: then that also is not possible.

original: 'di ltar / gzugs ni bum pa'i yan lag ste //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gzugs ni bum pa'i yan lag ste //
translated: Form is a part of a pot.

original: des na re zhig de bum min //
analyzed: des na re zhig de bum min //
translated: Therefore, it is not a pot.

original: gang phyir yan lag can med pa //
analyzed: gang phyir yan lag can med pa //
translated: Since there is no possessor of parts,

original: des na yan lag kyang yod min //
analyzed: des na yan lag kyang yod min //
translated: Therefore, the parts do not exist.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs pa'i ngo bo can bum pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni re re zhing yan lag tu gyur pa'i phyir bum pa'i brjod pa la brten par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs pa'i ngo bo can bum pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni re re zhing yan lag tu gyur pa'i phyir bum pa'i brjod pa la brten par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The form, etc., of a pot, which is the nature of a collection of form, etc., are not the basis of the expression pot, because each is a part.

original: bum pa ni yan lag can yin la gzugs la sogs pa ni yan lag yin no //
analyzed: bum pa ni yan lag can yin la gzugs la sogs pa ni yan lag yin no //
translated: A pot is the possessor of parts, and form, etc., are the parts.

original: re zhig gzugs ni yan lag yin pa'i phyir bum pa ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig gzugs ni yan lag yin pa'i phyir bum pa ma yin no //
translated: Form is not a pot, because it is a part.

original: gzugs ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du dri la sogs pa dag la yang brjod @214a * //
analyzed: gzugs ji ltar yin pa de bzhin du dri la sogs pa dag la yang brjod @214a * //
translated: As form is, so also smell, etc., should be stated.

original: par bya'o // gal te 'o na ni gzugs yan lag yin pa'i phyir yan lag can zhes bya ba de 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: par bya'o // gal te 'o na ni gzugs yan lag yin pa'i phyir yan lag can zhes bya ba de 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin nam /
translated: But if form is a part, then is there not something called a possessor of parts?

original: yan lag can la mi ltos pa'i yan lag dag ni mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: yan lag can la mi ltos pa'i yan lag dag ni mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: It is not reasonable that parts exist without a possessor of parts.

original: bshad par bya ste //
analyzed: bshad par bya ste //
translated: We reply:

original: 'dir gzugs la sogs pa re re la bum pa nyid med na yan lag can 'ga' zhig lta ga la yod //
analyzed: 'dir gzugs la sogs pa re re la bum pa nyid med na yan lag can 'ga' zhig lta ga la yod //
translated: If a vase does not exist in each of the parts such as form, how could it exist in a whole?

original: yan lag can zhes bya ba gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad par yongs su bcad par nus pa ma yin la /
analyzed: yan lag can zhes bya ba gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad par yongs su bcad par nus pa ma yin la /
translated: It is not possible to determine that a so-called whole is different from form and so on.

original: rang gi ngo bo yongs su ma bcad pa ni yod pa nyid du gzhag par nus pa yang ma yin pas yan lag can med do //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo yongs su ma bcad pa ni yod pa nyid du gzhag par nus pa yang ma yin pas yan lag can med do //
translated: And that which is not determined in its own nature cannot be posited as existent. Therefore a whole does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir yan lag can med pa'i phyir gzugs yan lag nyid du yang mi srid pas yan lag dang yan lag can gnyis med pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir yan lag can med pa'i phyir gzugs yan lag nyid du yang mi srid pas yan lag dang yan lag can gnyis med pa nyid do //
translated: Since a whole does not exist, form cannot be a part. Therefore neither a whole nor a part exists.

original: 'di las kyang /
analyzed: 'di las kyang /
translated: And also:

original: gzugs la sogs pa tshogs pa bum pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa tshogs pa bum pa ma yin te /
translated: A collection of form and so on is not a vase.

original: gang gi phyir /üîΩgzugs rnams kun la'ang gzugs nyid ni //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / gzugs rnams kun la'ang gzugs nyid ni //
translated: Because:üîΩThe form of all forms

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun ma yin na //
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun ma yin na //
translated: is not a characteristic that is different.

original: gcig la bum pa yod 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: gcig la bum pa yod 'gyur zhing //
translated: A vase would exist in one,

original: gzhan dag la min rgyu ci zhig / gzugs rnams kun la'ang zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir gzugs dang dri la sogs pa rnams la gzugs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag la min rgyu ci zhig / gzugs rnams kun la'ang zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir gzugs dang dri la sogs pa rnams la gzugs zhes bya'o //
translated: All forms means that form and so on, such as smell, are called form because they are included in the aggregate of form.

original: gzugs de rnams bum pa ltar snam bu la sogs pa dag la yang yod la /
analyzed: gzugs de rnams bum pa ltar snam bu la sogs pa dag la yang yod la /
translated: Those forms exist in cloth and so on, just as they exist in a vase.

original: de rnams bum pa la sogs pa tha dad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid la 'khrul pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de rnams bum pa la sogs pa tha dad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid la 'khrul pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Although they are different, such as a vase, they are not confused about their own characteristics.

original: thams cad du ngo bo mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad du ngo bo mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the same in all respects.

original: de la ji ltar gzugs gcig bum pa nyid du gnas pa de bzhin du snam bu la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i gzugs gzhan yang bum pa nyid du gnas par ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
analyzed: de la ji ltar gzugs gcig bum pa nyid du gnas pa de bzhin du snam bu la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i gzugs gzhan yang bum pa nyid du gnas par ci'i phyir mi 'dod /
translated: Just as one form abides as a vase, why do you not assert that another form related to cloth and so on also abides as a vase?

original: de yang bum pa nyid du gnas par ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang bum pa nyid du gnas par ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is also illogical that it abides as a vase.

original: mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa'i phyir bum pa nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid tha mi dad pa'i phyir bum pa nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Because it is not different from the characteristics of a vase, like the form and so on that abide as a vase.

original: de ltar las mi len pa la ni rgyu nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar las mi len pa la ni rgyu nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, if it does not take on karma, it would not exist as a cause.

original: de'i phyir thams cad bum pa nyid kho nar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad bum pa nyid kho nar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Therefore, everything would be just a vase,

original: yang na bum pa yang bum pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang na bum pa yang bum pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: or a vase would not be a vase.

original: ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa rnams tha mi dad par thal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du @214b gzugs dang dri la sogs pa rnams kyang tha mi dad par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa rnams tha mi dad par thal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du @214b gzugs dang dri la sogs pa rnams kyang tha mi dad par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Just as it follows that things such as vases are not different, it follows that form, smell, and so on are not different,

original: bum pa gcig las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa gcig las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not different from a single vase.

original: ci ste de rnams bum pa las gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin mod kyi /
analyzed: ci ste de rnams bum pa las gzhan ma yin pa nyid yin mod kyi /
translated: But if you think, ‚ÄúIndeed, they are not different from a vase,

original: de lta na yang gzugs dang ro la sogs pa dag la tha dad pa yod de de'i phyir tha mi dad par thal ba med do snyam na /
analyzed: de lta na yang gzugs dang ro la sogs pa dag la tha dad pa yod de de'i phyir tha mi dad par thal ba med do snyam na /
translated: but still, form, taste, and so on are different from each other, so the error of nondifference does not arise,‚ÄùüîΩthis is illogical.

original: 'di yang mi rigs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa /üîΩro sogs dag las gzugs gzhan zhing //
analyzed: 'di yang mi rigs so zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad pa / ro sogs dag las gzugs gzhan zhing //
translated: To demonstrate this, BhƒÅviveka says:üîΩIf you assert that form is different from taste and so on,

original: bum las min zhes khyod 'dod na //
analyzed: bum las min zhes khyod 'dod na //
translated: but not different from a vase,

original: de rnams ma rtogs rang med gang //
analyzed: de rnams ma rtogs rang med gang //
translated: then without realizing those, it would not exist.

original: gang de gzugs gzhan ji ltar min //üîΩgal te dbang po tha dad pa'i gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs ro la sogs pa dag las gzhan du rnam par 'jog na ni gzugs de bum pa las kyang gzhan yin no zhes bya bar ci ste mi gzhag / de gzugs las gzhan ro la
analyzed: gang de gzugs gzhan ji ltar min // gal te dbang po tha dad pa'i gzung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs ro la sogs pa dag las gzhan du rnam par 'jog na ni gzugs de bum pa las kyang gzhan yin no zhes bya bar ci ste mi gzhag / de gzugs las gzhan ro la
translated: How could it be different from other forms?üîΩIf form is posited as different from taste, etc., because it is the object apprehended by a different sense faculty, then why not posit that form is different from a pot?

original: sogs pa dag las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid ltar gzugs las gzhan nyid du 'gyur na /
analyzed: sogs pa dag las tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro la sogs pa'i rang gi bdag nyid ltar gzugs las gzhan nyid du 'gyur na /
translated: If it is different from form, it would be different from form, like the nature of taste, etc., because it is not different from taste, etc.

original: gzhan nyid du 'dod pa yang ma yin pas 'di mi rigs so //
analyzed: gzhan nyid du 'dod pa yang ma yin pas 'di mi rigs so //
translated: But since it is not asserted to be different, this is illogical.

original: gang gi tshe de ltar gzugs la sogs pa rnams la bum pa'i rgyu nyid mi srid pa de'i tshe nges par /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de ltar gzugs la sogs pa rnams la bum pa'i rgyu nyid mi srid pa de'i tshe nges par /
translated: When it is impossible for form, etc., to be the cause of a pot, then definitely:

original: bum pa la ni rgyu yod min //
analyzed: bum pa la ni rgyu yod min //
translated: A pot does not have a cause.

original: rgyu dang bral ba la ni rang nyid la rgyu med pa can gyi 'bras bu nyid med pas rang nyid 'bras bur mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu dang bral ba la ni rang nyid la rgyu med pa can gyi 'bras bu nyid med pas rang nyid 'bras bur mi 'gyur te /
translated: Since that which is devoid of a cause does not have the nature of an effect that lacks a cause, it does not become an effect.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar 'di rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu nyid mi srid pa /üîΩde'i phyir gzugs sog snga las gzhan du //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar 'di rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu nyid mi srid pa / de'i phyir gzugs sog snga las gzhan du //
translated: Because it is impossible for a result to be without a cause,

original: bum pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: bum pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
translated: therefore, a pot is not at all different from the prior form.

original: gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad par bum pa 'bras bur gyur par ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad par bum pa 'bras bur gyur par ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: A pot is not observed as a result that is different from form, etc.

original: gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i bum pa med do zhes bya bar grub bo //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i bum pa med do zhes bya bar grub bo //
translated: Therefore, a pot does not exist as different from form, etc.

original: ci ste bum pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa can ma yin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: ci ste bum pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa can ma yin pa kho na'o //
translated: But if you think that a pot is not the appropriator of form, etc.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What, then, is it?

original: rang gi yan lag tu gyur pa'i rgyu gyo mo rnams la ltos nas bum pa 'bras bu nyid yin la gyo mo rnams ni rgyu nyid yin no snyam du sems na 'di yang snying po med do zhes bshad pa /
analyzed: rang gi yan lag tu gyur pa'i rgyu gyo mo rnams la ltos nas bum pa 'bras bu nyid yin la gyo mo rnams ni rgyu nyid yin no snyam du sems na 'di yang snying po med do zhes bshad pa /
translated: If you think that a pot is a result in reliance on its causes, the pieces that are its parts, and that the pieces are the causes, this is also worthless.

original: bum pa rgyu las grub 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: bum pa rgyu las grub 'gyur zhing //
translated: If a pot were to be established from causes

original: rgyu ni gzhan las grub 'gyur na //üîΩgang la rang las grub med pa //
analyzed: rgyu ni gzhan las grub 'gyur na // gang la rang las grub med pa //
translated: and the causes were to be established from others,üîΩhow could that which is not established from itself

original: de yis gzhan po ji ltar bskyed //
analyzed: de yis gzhan po ji ltar bskyed //
translated: produce another?

original: @215a * // gal te bum pa'i rgyu gyo mo rnams las rten nas bum pa 'grub na de'i tshe gyo mo de rnams gang la ltos nas 'grub /
analyzed: @215a * // gal te bum pa'i rgyu gyo mo rnams las rten nas bum pa 'grub na de'i tshe gyo mo de rnams gang la ltos nas 'grub /
translated: If a pot is established in dependence on its causes, such as clay, then in dependence on what are those causes established?

original: re zhig de rnams ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub pa ni ma yin te rgyu med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: re zhig de rnams ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub pa ni ma yin te rgyu med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are not established by way of their own intrinsic reality because it follows they would be without a cause.

original: ci ste de rnams la yang rgyu gang zhig 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste de rnams la yang rgyu gang zhig 'dod na /
translated: But if you assert that they have a cause,

original: 'o na ni gyo mo rnams la rang gi ngo bo grub pa med de de rnams kyang rgyu gseg ma la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni gyo mo rnams la rang gi ngo bo grub pa med de de rnams kyang rgyu gseg ma la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then the clay is not established by way of its own intrinsic reality because it depends on its cause, the lump of clay.

original: gyo mo gang dag la rang nyid las grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de rnams kyis ni ji ltar gzhan rang gi ngo bos grub par 'gyur /
analyzed: gyo mo gang dag la rang nyid las grub pa yod pa ma yin pa de rnams kyis ni ji ltar gzhan rang gi ngo bos grub par 'gyur /
translated: How could that which is not established by way of its own intrinsic reality in clay be established by way of its own intrinsic reality in another?

original: de'i phyir bum pa med do ;
analyzed: de'i phyir bum pa med do ;
translated: Therefore a pot does not exist.

original: / bum pa 'gog par byed pa'i tshul gang yin pa 'di nyid ni 'bras bu thams cad mi 'grub pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: / bum pa 'gog par byed pa'i tshul gang yin pa 'di nyid ni 'bras bu thams cad mi 'grub pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This method of refuting a pot should be applied to the nonestablishment of all effects.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here someone might say:

original: gzugs la sogs pa tshogs pa rnams la bum par brjod pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa mang po nyid yin yang bum pa mang po nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa tshogs pa rnams la bum par brjod pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa mang po nyid yin yang bum pa mang po nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because a pot is said to be a collection of form, etc., it is not the case that although there are many forms, etc., a pot is many.

original: 'di yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di yang mi rigs te /
translated: This is not reasonable.

original: tshogs pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshogs pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a collection does not exist.

original: 'di ltar 'phrod pa 'dus par gyur kyang gzugs dri nyid du ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'phrod pa 'dus par gyur kyang gzugs dri nyid du ni mi 'thad de /
translated: Thus, even though there is a combination of the collection, it is not tenable that form is smell.

original: des na bum pa bzhin tshogs pa //
analyzed: des na bum pa bzhin tshogs pa //
translated: Therefore, like a pot,

original: gcig nyid du ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: gcig nyid du ni mi rigs so //
translated: a collection is not reasonable as one.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams tshogs kyang tshogs pa la gnas pa rnams kyis rang rang gi mtshan nyid mi 'dor ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams tshogs kyang tshogs pa la gnas pa rnams kyis rang rang gi mtshan nyid mi 'dor ro //
translated: Even though form, etc., are a collection, those that exist in the collection do not abandon their individual characteristics.

original: de'i phyir ji ltar tshogs pa'i gnas skabs na gzugs la rang gi ngo bos yongs su btang ba las dri nyid mi srid pa de bzhin du du ma'i rten can gyi tshogs pa la gcig nyid mi srid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir ji ltar tshogs pa'i gnas skabs na gzugs la rang gi ngo bos yongs su btang ba las dri nyid mi srid pa de bzhin du du ma'i rten can gyi tshogs pa la gcig nyid mi srid do //
translated: Therefore, just as it is impossible for smell to exist in form by way of its own entity in the state of a collection, in the same way, it is impossible for a collection that has many bases to be one.

original: tshogs pa de ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams las tha mi dad la gzugs la sogs pa de rnams kyang phan tshun du tha dad na gzugs la sogs pa rnams las tha mi dad pa'i tshogs pa gcig tu ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: tshogs pa de ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams las tha mi dad la gzugs la sogs pa de rnams kyang phan tshun du tha dad na gzugs la sogs pa rnams las tha mi dad pa'i tshogs pa gcig tu ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: That collection is not different from form and so on, but if those forms and so on are different from each other, how could they be a single collection that is not different from forms and so on?üîΩThe example is ‚Äúlike a pot.‚Äù

original: dpe bshad pa ni bum pa bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dpe bshad pa ni bum pa bzhin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Just as it is said:

original: ji ltar / mtshan nyid rnams dang so so ni ;
analyzed: ji ltar / mtshan nyid rnams dang so so ni ;
translated: Because the characteristics are not the same,

original: / min phyir bum pa gcig ma yin //
analyzed: / min phyir bum pa gcig ma yin //
translated: the pot is not a single unit.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa de bzhin du 'dir yang /
translated: and so on, in the same way here it is said:

original: mtshan nyid rnams dang so so ni //
analyzed: mtshan nyid rnams dang so so ni //
translated: Because the characteristics are not the same,

original: min phyir tshogs la gcig med do //
analyzed: min phyir tshogs la gcig med do //
translated: the collection is not a single unit.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus:

original: des na bum pa bzhin tshogs pa //
analyzed: des na bum pa bzhin tshogs pa //
translated: Therefore, like a pot,

original: gcig nyid du ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: gcig nyid du ni mi rigs so //
translated: the collection is not a single unit.

original: de'i phyir @215b tshogs pa mi srid pas gzugs la sogs pa la yang bum pa brtag par mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir @215b tshogs pa mi srid pas gzugs la sogs pa la yang bum pa brtag par mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, because the collection is impossible, it is not tenable to impute a pot to form and so on.üîΩAs has been explained,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pas /üîΩji ltar gzugs sogs ma gtogs par //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam par dpyad pas /üîΩji ltar gzugs sogs ma gtogs par //
translated: when analyzed in this way,

original: bum pa yod pa ma yin pa //üîΩde bzhin rlung la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: bum pa yod pa ma yin pa // de bzhin rlung la sogs pa ni //
translated: A pot does not exist apart from form and so on.

original: ma gtogs gzugs kyang yod ma yin //
analyzed: ma gtogs gzugs kyang yod ma yin //
translated: Likewise, form and so on do not exist apart from wind and so on.

original: ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa ma gtogs par bum pa ma grub pa de bzhin du bum par btogs pa'i nye bar len par gyur pa gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhin ni ma gtogs par mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa ma gtogs par bum pa ma grub pa de bzhin du bum par btogs pa'i nye bar len par gyur pa gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyang rlung la sogs pa 'byung ba chen po bzhin ni ma gtogs par mi 'grub ste /
translated: Just as a pot is not established apart from form and so on, likewise, the appropriated aggregates of form and so on, which are designated as a pot, are not established apart from the four great elements, such as wind and so on.

original: rgyu med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu med pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it would follow that they would be without a cause.

original: yang ji ltar rlung la sogs pa ma gtogs par gzugs dang dri la sogs pa mi srid pa de bzhin du 'byung ba chen po rnams kyang phan tshun ma gtogs par 'grub pa med pas rang gi ngo bos ma grub par brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: yang ji ltar rlung la sogs pa ma gtogs par gzugs dang dri la sogs pa mi srid pa de bzhin du 'byung ba chen po rnams kyang phan tshun ma gtogs par 'grub pa med pas rang gi ngo bos ma grub par brjod pa'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: Just as form, smell, and so on are not possible apart from wind and so on, likewise, the great elements are not established apart from each other. Therefore, to explain that they are not established by their own nature, it is said:

original: tsha ba me nyid du 'gyur te //
analyzed: tsha ba me nyid du 'gyur te //
translated: Heat would be fire.

original: tsha ba min pa ji ltar sreg / des na bud shing zhes bya ba //
analyzed: tsha ba min pa ji ltar sreg / des na bud shing zhes bya ba //
translated: How could that which is not hot burn?üîΩTherefore fuel does not exist.

original: yod min de med me yod min //
analyzed: yod min de med me yod min //
translated: Without it, fire does not exist.

original: 'di ni me ni sreg pa po yin la 'byung ba gsum ni bsreg par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni me ni sreg pa po yin la 'byung ba gsum ni bsreg par bya'o //
translated: Fire is the burner, and the three elements are what is to be burned.

original: de'i phyir bud shing zhes bya ba 'byung ba chen po gsum po de me kho nas bsreg gi gzhan gyis ni ma yin la bud shing kho na tshig par 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bud shing zhes bya ba 'byung ba chen po gsum po de me kho nas bsreg gi gzhan gyis ni ma yin la bud shing kho na tshig par 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
